id.description: ID of attached entity (node or relation)

direction.description: Direction of the connection: 'in' (edge is going into the hyper-edge), 'out' (edge is going out from thy hyper-edge), 'undir' (edge is attached undirected). This is the default.

weight.description: Weight of the edge. A floating-point number, which can be used to model the strength of the connection, as a whole. More general than endpoint-specific weights, and often sufficient.
